title: MicroSuite  On The Main Line
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Bright and Airy 1 Bedroom with Patio
description:
Bright and airy 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment located at 23rd and Brown. Large windows bring in plenty of natural light and a cute patio in the rear of the unit offers a quiet sitting area to enjoy a glass of wine or share a cozy outdoor meal with company. Step inside from the ground floor into a roomy eat-in kitchen framed by large windows - perfect for plants. Large bathroom features tiled floors, a bathtub/shower, and a window facing your personal little side alley. Save money with gas heat.
This apartment offers plenty of storage space with a large closet lining the hall, another closet in the living room, and access to an unfinished basement. Original hardwood floors throughout the apartment aside from the bedroom which is along the rear of the apartment keeping it quiet and insulated from any street noise for a good night's sleep.
This apartment's perfect location is a short distance walk from Whole Foods, CVS, Fairmount Bike Shop, Yoga studios, and plenty of bars and restaurants. description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: Wonderful Studio , Close To Train ,
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

-24/7 emergency maintenance service

-This is a cat friendly community

This condo is perfect for the city dweller who craves space and privacy but appreciates the vibrant city lifestyle.
